title: Enchanting 'Pushpa' Diamond and Pink Sapphire Jhumkas with Rice Pearls
materials: Base metal with Rhodium and Rose Gold Finish. Adorned with Sparkling Diamonds (NV Stns: 8.60 ct)
and delicate Rice Pearls (Rice Moti: 3.71 ct).
features: These beautifully crafted jhumkas feature a delicate floral design, reminiscent of the 'Pushpa' motif, transitioning from a diamond-studded floral top to cascading stylized leaves set with Pink Sapphires. The design culminates in a cluster of luminous Rice Pearls, adding a touch of traditional elegance. The intricate setting enhances the brilliance of each gemstone.
occasions: or any occasion where you want to add a touch of modern elegance with a traditional touch. Suitable for half-saree functions and other celebratory events.
description: These contemporary Jhumkas seamlessly blend traditional Indian design with a modern aesthetic. The floral motif is a timeless symbol of beauty and grace. The use of Diamonds, Pink Sapphires and Rice Pearls provides a vibrant and luxurious touch. These are statement pieces that showcase exquisite craftsmanship and timeless elegance.
